entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a wizard with a lightning scar.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A goblin who works at Gringotts bank and is offended by the idea of its defenses being breached.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, a wizard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, a witch.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school for wizards and witches where Harry studied.

relationships.description: Harry is talking to Griphook about breaking into a Gringotts vault.
Ron contradicts Griphook's statement that it is impossible to break into a Gringotts vault.
Harry has a memory of Hogwarts, which he sees when he touches his lightning scar.
